name: CRPFactory
description: Configurable Rights Pool Factory - create parameterized smart pools.

eventDecorators.name: LogNewCrp
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when someone's membership role is being updated.

functionDecorators.name: isCrp
functionDecorators.description: Check to see if a given address is a CRP.

returnDecorators.description: boolean indicating whether it is a CRP.

functionDecorators.name: newCrp
functionDecorators.description: Create a new CRP. emits a LogNewCRP event.

parameterDecorators.name: factoryAddress
parameterDecorators.description: - the BFactory instance used to create the underlying pool.

parameterDecorators.name: poolParams
parameterDecorators.description: - struct containing the names, tokens, weights, balances, and swap fee.

parameterDecorators.name: rights
parameterDecorators.description: - struct of permissions, configuring this CRP instance (see above for definitions).
